content: I'm feeling pretty good about it. I think it'll be really helpful to have a structured program and support from others who are going through the same thing. I'll definitely start looking into local groups and see what options are available. Thanks for the advice! By the way, I was thinking about how my recent 5K run on June 1st at the local park was a great way to test my endurance, and I'm hoping that experience will help me with my triathlon training.
